Articles.Content:
How many people here are left handed?

Ignore the above, which hand do you use?

Edited September 21, 2015 by Yukon0009
I write with my left hand if that counts? Am ambidextrous though.

Could be a poll!

I'm right-handed, so not in the group
*raises hand*
Search for older threads, there were few polls before.

I write with my left hand if that counts? Am ambidextrous though.

You're left handed. Being ambidextrous is actually a learned trait...

I'm right handed, but I use my left hand for things like eating. But my left hand writing is terrible.
I'm right handed but I use the mouse left handed. Much easier for me that way.

*raises hand*

Left or right hand?

I'm a bit between right handed and ambidextrous. Normally I'm right handed but according to some people I do certain things exactly how a lefty would do them.

Nope, right handed..

I typed that sentence and this one with my left index finger only.
I am right handed but I feel more comfortable wearing a watch on my right wrist oddly. The majority of righties prefer it on the left.

Florence Reece & Pete Seeger & Billy Bragg in the house.

Which

are you on,
? Which
are you on ?

*whistles

That was my immediate interpretation of your thread.
I can play the piano with my left hand!
Right handed.

I call myself quasidextrous. While I write left-handed and recently noticed I paint left-handed and do a few other things lefty, I do a lot of things, like throw a ball, right-handed.

Fun fact: Since the left side of the body is controlled by the right side of the brain, left-handed people are the only people in their right minds!
Right handed. I use my left hand to hold solder when I'm soldering if that means anything.

Life-long sinistral, right here. (Yes, that term does in fact mean "left-handed". Should give you some linguistic perspective on just how cultures used to view anything different than the norm, as well; "sinistral" is in fact from the same root word as "sinister".)
Lefty, reporting in.

Right handed.

(if you're trying to get statistics between who has what i'm thinking they may be skewed as left-handed, ambidexterous etc. people may be more inclined to post in a thread with the title "Lefties", resulting in fewer righties)

I am right handed, I do everything with my right hand. I write with my right, I eat with my right, I throw with my right, everything with my right. And I kick with my right foot. I jump off of my left foot for height or distance though. (except high jump, I can do either)
Anything that takes fine control I'm left sports I'm right
I'm right handed. When I write with my left hand, it goes the wrong way, making my handwriting even worse.
On topic this time, right-handed. But I also use my left, clumsy & untrained hand and arm when I am drawing. Depends on what I am looking for.
